title: Colin Moriarty Answers Jemi Bitti
description:
Jemi Bitti asked me to tell Colin something over on Up at Noon: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9fVpPW7McjU. Here, I do it. 

Watch more Conversations with Colin: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL85130F65C312F61E&feature=plcp

transcript_chunks.text: Hey Colin, Jemi Bitti writes, and oh yeah, Greg, Colin Mori arty looks like my dad a lot. Could you tell him that for me? Every time I see him pondering in the videos, he's like the village elder that everyone turns to. What are you doing? I'm, I'm filming . Why? We'll put this up then as a video. What, what are you filming? I'm filming your response to Jemi, Jemi Bitti . I see this right now. Yeah. What do you want me to say? What, what? Him, he said all he wanted me to do is tell you, so I've told you. Thank you. I appreciate that.
